name: Thief, But Worse
description:
A Local-Coop game made for the Collectibles/There and Back VimJam.

Two Players compete to steal the most collectibles.

Mash left/right keys to move. Crack the safe code to yoink the collectibles.

Enjoy :)

----Credits----

Programming: Me
